title: More cogent error messages during indexing
body_html:
Addresses #2424. New error message example:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "repro.py", line 33, in <module>
    torch.randn(3,3)[(1,torch.LongTensor([2]))]
TypeError: Performing basic indexing on a tensor and encountered an error indexing dim 1 with an object of type torch.LongTensor. The only supported types are integers, slices, numpy scalars, or if indexing with a torch.LongTensor or torch.ByteTensor only a single Tensor may be passed.

Also adds type and dimensionality information for advanced indexing errors.

body:
Addresses #2424. New error message example:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "repro.py", line 33, in <module>
    torch.randn(3,3)[(1,torch.LongTensor([2]))]
TypeError: Performing basic indexing on a tensor and encountered an error indexing dim 1 with an object of type torch.LongTensor. The only supported types are integers, slices, numpy scalars, or if indexing with a torch.LongTensor or torch.ByteTensor only a single Tensor may be passed.
```

Also adds type and dimensionality information for advanced indexing errors.
